forms.label: User token duration(s)
forms.description: Validity in seconds for the JWT token of a user. Minimum value must be 600s (10m)

forms.label: Allow user to refresh token?
forms.description: User can call the session refresh API without logging in.

forms.label: Bot token validity (m)
forms.description: Validity in minutes for the JWT token of a bot. Minimum value must be 15m

forms.label: Heartbeat interval (s)
forms.description: Heartbeat interval in seconds. Heartbeat is used to keep the session alive.

forms.label: Max. heartbeat miss count
forms.description: Max. number of consecutive missed-heartbeats to invalidate a session.

forms.label: Strong password
forms.description: Enable/Disable strong password requirement.

forms.label: Min. password length
forms.description: Required min. length of the password.

forms.label: Close window to logout
forms.description: End the user session when the user closed the window.

forms.label: No. of failed login attempts to lock the account.
forms.description: Max. number of consecutive login failures allowed before the account is locked.

forms.label: Time window to count failed attempts (s)
forms.description: Time interval for which the number of consecutive login failures should be counted.

forms.label: Cooldown duration before account is reenabled (s)
forms.description: The account is reactivated after RBAC_USER_LOGIN_FAILURE_COOLDOWN seconds if it gets locked due to multiple failed logins attempts.

forms.label: Single active session per user
forms.description: If enabled, users can have only one active session.

forms.label: Allow user to relogin?
forms.description: Allow a user to start a new session while one is already active. This works with RBAC_USER_TO_SINGLE_SESSION setting.
